item.title: By: Simon
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
*hug* That sucks. And, sadly, I think everybody has to go through something like this at some time to make them start to take backups seriously :-(
(that's not intended to sound like it serves you right. Of course it doesn't. It's hard to say that without sounding that way though...)
item.content:encoded:
*hug*
That sucks.
And, sadly, I think everybody has to go through something like this at some time to make them start to take backups seriously 🙁

(that’s not intended to sound like it serves you right. Of course it doesn’t. It’s hard to say that without sounding that way though…)
